SEARCH
Package gw.api.financials

Class FinancialsUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.financials.FinancialsUtil
public class FinancialsUtil extends Object
Provides methods for manipulating transactions in the ClaimCenter user inteface.
Author:
cgross

    • canExceedAvailableReservesRegardlessOfLimit

    • updateCustomTransactionIdsForClaim

      public static void updateCustomTransactionIdsForClaim(Claim claim, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Query<TransactionView> txnsQuery)
      Sets the Query to retrieve the custom set of Transactions on the claim context and sets the filter on the transactions page to view custom transactions. Does not forward to transactions page.
      Parameters:
      claim - The Claim for which the "custom" option and this list of IDs should be saved as the default filtering option for the Claim Financials Transactions LV
      txnsQuery - the Query to retrieve the custom set of Transactions

    • updateCustomTransactionIdsForClaim

      public static void updateCustomTransactionIdsForClaim(Claim claim, FinancialsExpression expression, Collection<? extends TAccountOwnerDelegate> tAccountOwnerDelegates)
      Sets the Query to retrieve the custom set of Transactions on the claim context and sets the filter on the transactions page to view custom transactions. Does not forward to transactions page.
      Parameters:
      claim - The Claim for which the "custom" option and this list of IDs should be saved as the default filtering option for the Claim Financials Transactions LV
      tAccountOwnerDelegates - the reserve lines for which the custom set of Transactions is to be displayed

    • validateCostCategoryAndTransactionLines

      public static void validateCostCategoryAndTransactionLines(Transaction txn)
      Resets the CostCategory if current value is no longer valid given the Exposure.PrimaryCoverage/CostType pair. also resets the LineCategory for the transaction's lineitems if its value is no longer valid in combination with the Exposure.PrimaryCoverage/CostType/CostCategory
      Parameters:
      txn - The transaction whose CostCategory and line items' LineCategories should be validated.

    • deleteReserve

      public static void deleteReserve(Reserve reserveToDelete)
      Deletes the given reserve and all other reserves in its ReserveSet immediately. The ReserveSet must be unapproved.

      Note that the method uses its own bundle and commits the delete, so it will occur in a separate transaction from any other edits.

      Parameters:
      reserveToDelete - The Reserve to be deleted.

    • logRecode

      public static void logRecode(Payment originalPayment, Payment payment)
      Outputs a log message regarding the recoding of the original payment to the new payment.
      Parameters:
      originalPayment - The payment being recoded.
      payment - The new onset payment that is the result of the recoding operation.

    • preCommitRecovery

      public static void preCommitRecovery(Recovery recovery)
      Performs some pre-processing of a new Recovery prior to committing it.
      Parameters:
      recovery - the new Recovery that will be committed after this pre-processing is complete

    • logRecoverySave

      public static void logRecoverySave(Recovery recovery)
      Logs the save of a new Recovery.
      Parameters:
      recovery - the Recovery Transaction that was saved

    • ensureRecoveryHasOneLineItem

      public static void ensureRecoveryHasOneLineItem(Recovery recovery)
      Tests whether the indicated Recovery has at least one TransactionLineItem, and if not adds a single new line item.
      Parameters:
      recovery - The Recovery to test for the existence of at least one TransactionLineItem.

    • refreshPaymentType

      public static void refreshPaymentType(Payment onsetPayment)
      Refreshes the PaymentType and ErodesReserves of an onset payment when the payment is changed. The PaymentType will be the same as the original payment unless the claim/exposure to which the payment is being recoded or transferred is closed, in which case the payment type of the onset payment must be PaymentType.TC_SUPPLEMENT.

      Note: This method calls refreshErodesReserves() to update that property.

      Parameters:
      onsetPayment - The onset payment whose payment type is being refreshed.

    • refreshErodesReserves

      public static void refreshErodesReserves(Payment onsetPayment)
      Refreshes the ErodesReserves property of an onset payment when the payment is changed. This should be called after the intended PaymentType has been set on the onset. The new ErodesReserves will be the same as the original payment unless (a) it must be false (NonEroding) because PaymentType is Supplement, (b) the original PaymentType was supplement, so it had to be NonEroding, hence we should probably assume it should be eroding on an open target ReserveLine.
      Parameters:
      onsetPayment - The onset payment whose ErodesReserves property is being refreshed.

    • newRecovery

      public static Recovery newRecovery(Claim claim, Payment payment)
      Creates a new Recovery on the given Claim with the same reserve line coding and lineitems as the indicated Payment (i.e., this is a recovery for the indicated payment).
      Parameters:
      claim - The claim for which to create the new Recovery transaction
      payment - The payment whose reserveline coding and lineitems should be copied for this new Recovery.
      Returns:
      the new Recovery

    • getFinancialsSummaryOption

      public static String getFinancialsSummaryOption(Claim claim)
      Provides the saved filter option for the financials summary screen as a String (e.g., Exposure, Claimant, etc.), or null if none has been saved.
      Returns:
      String containing the saved filter option
      See Also:
      • setFinancialsSummaryOption(entity.Claim, String)

    • setFinancialsSummaryOption

      Saves the filter option for the financials summary screen in the session
      Parameters:
      claim - The Claim for which to save this filtering option.
      option - The new filtering option for this claim.
      See Also:
      • getFinancialsSummaryOption(entity.Claim)

      public static boolean isEditableFinancialsVersion()
      Tests whether or not the version of financials installed is read-only.
      Returns:
      FALSE if the version of financials installed is read-only, else TRUE

      Returns:

    • isManualCheckAllowed

      public static boolean isManualCheckAllowed(Claim claim)
      Returns whether a manual check is allowed to be created on the given claim. A normal check must be allowed as a precondition for a manual check to be allowed.
      Parameters:
      claim - the claim for which to test whether a manual check can be created
      Returns:
      true if a manual check can be created on this claim, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • approveWithoutSubmittingForApproval

      public static void approveWithoutSubmittingForApproval(ReserveSet reserveSet) throws com.guidewire.cc.system.exception.ClosedExposureException, com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.WorkflowValidationException
      Marks transactions in the set as approved without running the pre-setup rules or submitting for approval.
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.cc.system.exception.ClosedExposureException
      com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.WorkflowValidationException

    • setBookingDate

      public static void setBookingDate(Transaction trans, Date d)
      DO NOT USE THIS METHOD UNLESS YOU HAVE READ THE DOCS FOR THE BookingDate COLUMN IN BOTH CLAIMCENTER AND DATAHUB MANUALS. A method for setting the BookingDate column on a Transaction. This is provided for rare cases when the BookingDate needs to be set from Gosu code. An example would be if using Web Service calls to import very old transactions, and setting BookingDate to the current time is not appropriate. Such a case requires more work in CC and DataHub to work correctly.
      Parameters:
      trans - transaction to update
